2007210.name: One-armed Cook: Drinks and bars
2007210.description:
One-armed cook: Drinks and bars is the ultimate addition to your cooking experience!

Put your bartending skill to the test and impress the customers and your friends with delicious and unique drinks. From classic cocktails to modern mixers, the possibilites are endless. So why not grab your shaker and get mixing?

But the fun doesn't stop there - every creation of a cocktail is made more challenging with the physics-based gameplay. From spilling drinks to juggling bottles and glasses, you'll need quick reflexes and a steady hand to impress your customers and keep them happy.
2007210.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
